pullrequest.title: Model Editor: Undo insert / delete links

content.raw: I looked into the issue with running the tests one after another and for this integration test. I think there is a problem with `QMenu::exec` - it shows up and immediately disappears (when context menu call is invoked) that's why `TriggerDelete` wasn't able to find it.
content.html: I looked into the issue with running the tests one after another and for this integration test. I think there is a problem with QMenu::exec - it shows up and immediately disappears (when context menu call is invoked) that's why TriggerDelete wasn't able to find it.
